sentence1: A fly car crashed in NE state last year and most of the Blink-Blink band was in there. The only safe ones from the crash were DJ AM and music friend Travis Barker. Both AM and Barker got bad burns and they needed to stay in hospital for many weeks. Now AM asks $20 million for injuries he got. He lawsuits against plane maker Learjet and wants to gain $10 million for medicine damage, lost work and fun and the same amount for mind and body hurt.
